statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.Name, BB.Name, AA.ChannelMargin, AA.BrandMargin) as RowNo
, AA.StoreID , SS.Name as StoreName
, AA.ChannelID , CC.Name as ChannelName , E2.Name as ChannelManager
, AA.BrandID , BB.Name as BrandName , E1.Name as BrandManager
, AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, AA.ChannelMargin , AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 as ChannelAccAmt
, (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin) as BrandMargin , AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as BrandAccAmt
, AA.BrandMargin - AA.ChannelMargin as SaleMargin , AA.OrderAmt - AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 - AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as SaleAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.StoreID , AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CB.ChannelMargin , CB.BrandMargin , SUM(AA.OrderQty) as OrderQty , SUM(AA.OrderAmt) as OrderAmt FROM dbo.TOrderSumDay AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannelBrand CB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = CB.BrandID AND CB.StartDate <= AA.OrderDate AND ISNULL(CB.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, AA.OrderDate)) >= AA.OrderDate WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.StoreID = #StoreID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
GROUP BY AA.StoreID, AA.ChannelID, AA.BrandID, CB.ChannelMargin, CB.BrandMargin ) AA LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrandManager B1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = B1.BrandID AND B1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(B1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee E1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON B1.EmployeeID = E1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannelManager C1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = C1.ChannelID AND C1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(C1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee E2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C1.EmployeeID = E2.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TStore SS WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.StoreID = SS.ID ORDER BY RowNo
